Better than expected. The Hideaway is truly that; a hideaway. The entry is tucked around the side of the building in a somewhat obscure side door of a multi tenant building. Although there were other people in the building, there was no noise whatsoever; very quiet. The Hideaway itself has everything you need for a short stay and is well appointed with amenities like a coffeemaker, cook surface, full size refrigerator, very nice washer and dryer and a small grassy side yard for our pet to use. The bathroom and shower is conveniently located adjacent to the bedroom and is well appointed. The shower is spacious and functions very well. The only caveat is that the surrounding neighborhood isn't 5 star, but the Hideaway is tucked in so well that this wasn't a concern. Off-street parking helped tremendously and overall we felt very safe and secure. I definitely would stay in this location again and I can recommend it to you without reservation.
